htmlbody: Hi there We're looking for case studies for our brand-new e-deliberation platform Deebase.Are you a local government agency/company/movement willing to test the effectiveness e-deliberation? Maybe we can help you. We are 4d3, a start-up working on Deebase, an easy-to-use and social-integrated e-deliberation platform. We're beta testing the platform and we're now opening it to companies/public administrations willing to test it.
title: Pilot tests wanted
